15.eng-name: The Chapters On Judgements From The Messenger of Allah
15.ara-name: كتاب الأحكام عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Samurah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The neighbor of a home has more right to the home

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Preemption
